item.title: S&P Climbs, Dollar Strengthens as Yuan, Euro Weaken
item.description: U.S. stocks were mixed. The S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite climbed, while the Dow industrials ticked lower.

item.title: Dollar Strengthens as Trump Targets BRICS

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Fall
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures fell, continuing recent trend of large daily swings up and down as temperature forecasts remain volatile.

item.title: In Response to Property Crisis, China Studies Fundamental Overhaul
item.description: Beijing is taking steps to ease the segregation of urban and rural populations.

item.title: This Old House? Home Buyers' Best Deals Are on Builders' Lots
item.description: The premium that buyers have usually had to pay for a brand-new house is disappearing.
